text:
thank you for your replay .
I understood the order of contact is inconsistent

Hey there, not sure if this is the right channel, please let me know what a better one would be, but we have an app listed in the HS marketplace, and have successfully create some custom workflow actions for it via the API. We like how we can publish it once for the APP, and all clients that have integrated our app with HS see the actions.

My question is: Can the same be done with Modules? We would really benefit from having the same flow to create some custom modules that clients can then use in their email templates.

Thanks.
Hello all ! , can someone can help me for this ?
Would it be possible to get the error screen in an English translation instead of a French one? I suspect we could get you more replies that way.
